website_summaries.verdict: This beautifully designed set is the perfect choice for anyone desiring a unique twist to their billiard games.
pros: This set boasts regulation weight and size for supreme playing
Includes a cue ball making this product a 16-ball set
cons: A few buyers had issues with the set arriving damaged

customer_reviews.title: Not all balls are same diameter
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice looking pool balls. However, I played a few games with them, and had no trouble deciphering between solid and stripes and numbers but when racking them the third time, the 3 ball looked odd. It looked small. So I lined them all up and placed a straight flat item over the top, and learned not only was the three smaller, but most of the solids were smaller than the stripes, and the 12 ball (stripes) was the same smaller size. So they are mixed diameters. So strange. I will end up buying new balls from a billiards store in person, and donate these to the club house. So disappointing. They really do look great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Maxx Smith

customer_reviews.title: The marble/Swirl style balls looks nice on my red cloth
customer_reviews.text: The marble/Swirl style balls looks nice on my red cloth. Style is colorful. Two problems: 1- Eight ball has an extra white circle, two with the number eight and one just plain white. 2- Cue ball is heavier than the standard 5.5 - 6 Oz it weights almost 7 Oz, Had to replaced it.
customer_reviews.author: CARLOS LARIOS

customer_reviews.title: 10 ball slightly small
customer_reviews.text: The balls are beautiful, functional and stay clean. My daughter gave them to my husband for Christmas. The reason we gave them a 3 is that the 10 ball was slightly small. My husband plays billiards competitively and practices everyday, so he noticed after playing with them a bit. If there was a way to get a replacement 10 ball, we would probably give them 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: TeeGeeMayhem

customer_reviews.title: Good Set of Pool Balls and Attractive Pattern
customer_reviews.text: I love these new balls for our pool table, they roll smoothly on the table and all the hits are consistent for hitting the balls. I love the swirling pattern in the balls. My only negative comment is the 8 ball is a little hard to separate from the other balls as they all have the same swirling pattern but that did not stop me from buying the package. The price was very fair and I hope to get many years of use out of the set.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Douglas

customer_reviews.title: the second set looks fine. will update once i get a few more ...
customer_reviews.text: just bought a set recently. 1/2/18. two balls has a dent in them and one ball has a hole in it. make sure to inspection your balls when you get them. thankfully amazon was quick to exchange it free of charge. the second set looks fine. will update once i get a few more games in.
customer_reviews.author: VinDi

customer_reviews.title: Overall great value and unique set.
customer_reviews.text: Let me start off by saying these are great. I was looking for some unique billiard balls for my new pool table. These are beautiful! I only have two issues with them. First is that the red and the orange is very similar. I wish the colors were a little more distinct. The other issue is that the swirls sometimes make it a little difficult to distinguish solids from stripes. Overall they are a great value for the price and they look great on the table.
customer_reviews.author: Coty O.

customer_reviews.title: Everybody loved them. You do notice some discoloring or smears ...
customer_reviews.text: These were a buy for the pool table after I put on new rails and felt. Everybody loved them. You do notice some discoloring or smears in a couple of the balls. Mostly reds and oranges have them and they are only a very small part of the balls. Almost like they did it and set them on a paper towel to dry. Overall, though, very happy with them. Very different and new friends that come over always comment on them.
customer_reviews.author: SCdane

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace an older basic set of balls. They arrived on time and well packaged. Exactly as pictured. Nice patteren to them. Takes some getting used to playing a game with them. Extremely responsive. Didn't realize how bad the basic set truly was. For the price you can't beat them.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE them!
customer_reviews.text: They are absolutely beautiful! Really makes my pool table pop! Regulation weight and a stunning appearance. I love them! We did get a defective ball with a small hole in it but when I contacted the company they immediately sent out a new ball... that same day! I was amazed with the fast response and amazing customer service. They are a great set of pool balls that come from an even better company. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Brinkmann

customer_reviews.title: Very cool
customer_reviews.text: These look just like the picture. They are same size as regulation balls but your eyes will deceive you. I put them next to our old set and place a ruler across the top of them to be sure. They are same size and give the table an cooler updated look. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie F.

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time, as described. These balls are very stylish and look incredible. The description says that they are regulation size but are slightly smaller than the ones I replaced but I honestly don’t know what “regulation size” actually is.
customer_reviews.author: Charles D.

customer_reviews.title: For my husband
customer_reviews.text: He had these on his amazon list, so he got them for Christmas! Yes, I’m late with my review lol he loves them though! We have been using them on our pool table ever since 😊
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Ann Yanni

customer_reviews.title: Hart to tell solids from stripes
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set of Billiard balls...but the Marbling is so sparse that you cant tell a stripe from a Solid. We ended up using a sharpie and making a black line along the edge of the stripes.
customer_reviews.author: allan dumas

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I've had these balls for almost a year now they're very nice they're different for some reason the q-ball sucked I'm actually using the cue ball for my old set don't know why even so is a very nice set I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: john Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Nice, durable, fun. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Fun pool balls - working as described after about 6 months. My original pool balls were scuffed and needed to be refreshed. These did the trick. Good polished surface - good for spin and trick shots (not like I’m a master at trick shots). Pattern is good for color-blind players, a bonus feature. Would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: SBinOregon

customer_reviews.title: Great Look
customer_reviews.text: Received these as a birthday present. They defiantly stand out especially when I'm at college. No mistaking it for the campus set with is good. They feel solid and play just as good as any other set I have used. Note that they might not look exactly like the picture due to the marbling process.
customer_reviews.author: Jonah B.

customer_reviews.title: pretty balls
customer_reviews.text: Loved the new billiard balls that we got for Christmas. Everyone who came over to visit noticed them right away. Well worth the money, arrived in a timely fashion.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Newcomb

customer_reviews.title: Gave as a gift
customer_reviews.text: I had it shipped straight to the person, so I didn’t see it. They said they loved it, so that’s all I had to go on.
customer_reviews.author: Starlight

customer_reviews.title: Lose Half Your Money To Return
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to play in Black Light, the white on regular Billiard Balls glows well under Black Light, the white on these don't react at all. Obviously they don't do what I wanted, so I attempted to return. $10 charge for pretty much any return option besides UPS Pickup, which is $16. Not even worth getting half my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Collins

customer_reviews.title: Just beautiful
customer_reviews.text: These are some awesome balls and the marble color adds a beautiful take to the new blue table top
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Troy L. Arrington

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart not even 2 weeks old wtf......
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these not even 2 weeks and the “1” fell out of the 13 ball.....absolutely junk waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Balls
customer_reviews.text: They came as described. Love them. Rolls smooth and true!
customer_reviews.author: Terry Spears

customer_reviews.title: Great on a pool table
customer_reviews.text: They would’ve been perfect but one of the balls had a big imperfection in the design. Other than that, they are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: rhondix79

customer_reviews.title: Awesome balls
customer_reviews.text: Awesome I bought these just for the look and it dose the job and they play well to. Still like my normal old school regulation balls can’t beat them.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: beautiful, durable
customer_reviews.text: beautiful, durable. the cat has knocked one off on onto the bare concrete floor and while it made a big sound, no damage. the red and orange are a little close together in tone and stripes can be mistaken for solid. still Id buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Aurora Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Great look
customer_reviews.text: These were a hit for my pool player GF. My guests are also impressed by them. They do take some getting used to to tell which is a stripe and which is a solid but once you get used to them these really spice up the pool table.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Bohanan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great pool balls. No issues. Slightly heavier than my other set, but nice anyway
customer_reviews.author: Randy B

customer_reviews.title: Good billiard balls
customer_reviews.text: Good billiard balls. Not pro quality but great for a home table or a pool hall. And a pretty cool design.
customer_reviews.author: M. Van Kleeck

customer_reviews.title: SRIPES OR SOLID? BETTER PAY ATTENTION!
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to tell if the ball is solid or stirped because the solid balls have big white areas sometimes making it difficult to tell. A few games have been lost and it's a huge design flaw. Very impressive looking and presentable for gifting but be cautious when playing.
customer_reviews.author: shelly

customer_reviews.title: they are a nice alternative to the standard
customer_reviews.text: bought them as a gift for my dad for christmas.. they are a nice alternative to the standard balls
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Balls!
customer_reviews.text: These balls are beautiful! I love everything about this set. Comes in fantastic glossy condition, and they hold up and play very well. Definitely will make you feel classier to use these!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Do not look near as crisp as the photo shows. Ours look like they run out of screen printing ink and are hard to distinguish stripes from solids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Balls
customer_reviews.text: Don’t scratch these balls, they look amazing. Not only do they look good, but they roll smooth. So shiny!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Barry Batterman

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: I literally ordered these around noon yesterday and they were delivered BEFORE NOON TODAY! And I don't have prime and used the free 5-7 business day shipping! Super pleased all around! Great look, solid! My husband will be super pleased with these!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These things are crazy cool looking! Pleasantly surprised and the price was right 👍🏽

customer_reviews.title: Not what you see in the picture.
customer_reviews.text: The balls are not what they look like in the picture. The balls are very confusing because they look alike between the "Stripes" and "solids". The stripes are not so clearly defined so you have to look very closely to ensure you are fully understanding which balls are on the table.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H.

customer_reviews.title: They chip fast
customer_reviews.text: We have had these a little over a month and they are already chipping. And I only had a 30 day return limit.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to see what balls are once they are all on the table. Stripes and Solids that is.
customer_reviews.author: Larissa

customer_reviews.title: Iszy pool balls
customer_reviews.text: I should have returned these balls, I have flat spots on one ball. I didn't notice until last weekend. My last day to return these expired yesterday.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Percer

customer_reviews.title: Smell bad
customer_reviews.text: These billiard balls smell like an ash tray that was sprayed with cologne.
customer_reviews.author: Mark B

customer_reviews.title: Not your ordinary set of balls
customer_reviews.text: This set of balls are amazing. The thing I really like is that it is a break for the ordinary standard set of balls.
customer_reviews.author: Jason R McCutcheon

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband and he loves them. They are beautiful. The only thing that differed from the expectation, is we thought the balls themselves would be heavier than they were. Would buy again if necessary.

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Balls look good. A couple had defects out of the box.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This set of billiard balls are stunning in person! Beautiful marbilization on each ball... They are all so individual!

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars

customer_reviews.author: Lois

customer_reviews.title: The marble design is not on the whole ball
customer_reviews.text: The description of this product is completely off. The marble design is only on one side of the ball the opposite side is just a plain color I was very disappointed when I opened the box

customer_reviews.title: Colorful
customer_reviews.text: Love these balls. The colors are vivid and add a lot to the look of my black felt.

customer_reviews.title: splashy balls
customer_reviews.text: very nice looking pool balls!! they have a splashy look when rolling good quality!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Cool balls
customer_reviews.text: The balls are great! They meet my expectations and the kids love them

customer_reviews.title: Nice and very cool looking
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my husband and he loves them. Great value for the price.

customer_reviews.title: Good value

customer_reviews.title: Look Good
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful balls, however in less tha. Two hours of normal play, 2 balls have issues. The Nine and Eleven are missing parts of the numbers. Very dissappointed

customer_reviews.title: Overall good
customer_reviews.text: Hard to get used to the marble. Hard to differentiate the yellow stripe and solid

customer_reviews.title: These balls are attractive, i for one, do ...
customer_reviews.text: These balls are attractive, i for one, do not see how anyone mistakes the solids for the stripes, there is not a big enough void on any one of them to even begin to mistake them for a stripe. Will update on quality after playing with them ;)
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great set for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: These look amazing and havent noticed any flaws in them. The red and orange are very close in color but they are still so sweet looking

customer_reviews.title: Cool billiard balls!
customer_reviews.text: These are very unique balls. Upon playing with them, some can be difficult to determine stripes or solids at a glance, but they are cool enough that it not matters.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One ball is smaller than the rest
customer_reviews.text: Ir would have been perfect but one ball is smaller than th rest but other than that they are ok
customer_reviews.author: maylene rubio

customer_reviews.title: Excellent coloring and solid pool balls
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints. Excellent coloring and solid pool balls.
customer_reviews.author: LoneOsprey

customer_reviews.title: Hard to tell what’s stripes and what’s solid
customer_reviews.text: Pictures online were much better then real life product. It’s hard to tell which is stripes and which is solid on the set I got
customer_reviews.author: Stephan Schurwing

customer_reviews.title: I really like the product because of the look
customer_reviews.text: I really like the product because of the look. I couldn't give it a 5 star because it is difficult to tell the difference the solids and stripes.
customer_reviews.author: Rinny

customer_reviews.title: Awesome design
customer_reviews.text: The design is awesome and they really look good for the project we've been working on. I see us making another order soon.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Hedgepeth

customer_reviews.title: Overall a great set!
customer_reviews.text: This a great set of billiard balls! Some of the other reviews stated that it is hard to tell stripes from solids, but I don't see that to be an issue at all! The marble design looks awesome, and the product comes in a cute box. A very nice gift for my father, he will love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fairly Priced and Fun
customer_reviews.text: This set would likely be a welcome gift for those interested in uncommon items. I have found a lot of other novelty balls to be too distracting, but these are easy to recognize during play as they are so close to standard. Though most of us would expect this, each set is completely unique - the pattern will vary and may have more white/cream in the swirls than is pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Color style confuses
customer_reviews.text: I like it but sometimes could get confused with the balls you have to look at them really closely

customer_reviews.title: Iszy Billiards Pool Table Billiard Ball Set, Marble/Swirl Style
customer_reviews.text: I love this set of billiards. They bring a unique style when playing. All my friends like them.

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Nice balls, lots of detail in the marbling. Colors are bright. Great upgrade

customer_reviews.title: Clean looking and nice to use
customer_reviews.text: Been playing every weekend since I got them , Have three older sons and they love to come over and play.

customer_reviews.title: Very cool
customer_reviews.text: Very cool set. Takes a little time to get used to which one is which.

customer_reviews.title: Cool pool balls
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little hard to distinguish between stripes and solids, but otherwise they’re perfectly fine.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved them ...you may think im crazy, but they actually have great action...

customer_reviews.text: The items are exactly like the picture and are fun to play with. Definitely must pay attention to the design

customer_reviews.title: It is hard to tell which balls are which on the table. Who sang

customer_reviews.text: The balls are awesome only thing we don't like about them is the swirl is kinda hard to tell solid from stripes in some of the colors.

customer_reviews.title: Swirly.
customer_reviews.text: It takes a game or two to get used to what is what. They look good and were reasonably priced and prime shipping. Couldn't go wrong.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a father's day gift and he loves it.

customer_reviews.text: I saw negative feeds about not being able to tell between solids and stripes. I don't get it. These things are very cool and easy to tell apart.

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: We needed a set for our carpet ball table and these were great. The kids loved the marbling!

customer_reviews.title: hard to tell apart

customer_reviews.title: colors NOT as vibrant as the photo... diffucult to play with
customer_reviews.text: I really EXPECTED the billiard balls to look like this photo... the first set did not... the colors are NOT as vibrant as the photo.... it was difficult to tell the balls apart... we talked to the company and the sent us a couple replacements, and then 4 more replacements. So they were very willing to work with us! I appreciate that... but I wouldn't order these again.... it is difficult to tell them apart when playing pool
customer_reviews.author: mickic

customer_reviews.title: Best balls ever+
customer_reviews.text: I love these balls. They were a gift from the most precious person I know!

customer_reviews.title: I liked them, but my friends got confused from the ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked them,but my friends got confused from the high balls, stripes, and low balls, solids. Some low balls had to much white.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good set but sometimes not easy to tell stripes from solids

customer_reviews.text: Great quality . . Presentable to show.. on my pool table ... great color design .

customer_reviews.title: Very good

customer_reviews.title: Great price great action and we have not had any ...
customer_reviews.text: Great price great action and we have not had any trouble being able to tell the strips from the solids.

customer_reviews.title: Great Set
customer_reviews.text: These billiard balls are great. The set i received had a good swirl to them. The quality is great.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars

product_meta.title: Iszy Billiards Pool Table Billiard Ball Set, Marble/Swirl Style
product_meta.description: 2 1/4" regulation size and weight - Made of polyester resin - 6 ounce balls - Marble/Swirl style makes a great addition to a table - Price shown is for full set of balls including cue ball - Set comes boxed
feature_bullets: Grade A deluxe quality - 2 1/4" regulation size and weight
Made of polyester resin - 6 ounce balls Marble / swirl style makes a great addition to a table
Price shown is for full set of balls including cue ball
